statement.name: final
statement.parts: SELECT M1.SIJI_BANGO AS SIJI_BANGO /* 指示番号 */ ,M1.SIJI_YMD AS SIJI_YMD /* 指示年月日 */ ,M1.JYURYOKAISYA_CD AS JYURYOKAISYA_CD /* 入荷会社コード */ ,M2.MEISYO_NM AS JYURYOKAISYA_NM /* 入荷会社名 */ ,M1.JYURYOTEN_CD AS JYURYOTEN_CD /* 入荷店コード */ ,M4.TENPO_NM AS JYURYOTEN_NM /* 入荷店名 */ ,M1.SYUKKAKAISYA_CD AS SYUKKAKAISYA_CD /* 出荷会社コード */ ,M3.MEISYO_NM AS SYUKKAKAISYA_NM /* 出荷会社名 */ ,M1.SYUKKATEN_CD AS SYUKKATEN_CD /* 出荷店コード */ ,M5.TENPO_NM AS SYUKKATEN_NM /* 出荷店名 */ ,M1.NYURYOKUTAN_CD AS NYURYOKUTAN_CD /* 入力担当者 */ ,M1.TYAKU_YMD AS TYAKU_YMD /* 着日 */ ,M1.SYUKKASITEI_YMD AS SYUKKASITEI_YMD /* 出荷指定日 */ ,M1.COMMENT_NM AS COMMENT_NM /* コメント */ ,M1.IDORIYU_KB AS IDORIYU_KB /* 移動指示理由 */ ,M1.ADD_YMD ,M1.ADD_TM ,M1.ADDTAN_CD ,M1.UPD_YMD ,M1.UPD_TM ,M1.UPD_TANCD ,M1.SAKUJYO_YMD ,M1.SAKUJYO_FLG FROM MDUT0030 M1 LEFT OUTER JOIN MDMT0100 M2 /* [名称MST] 入荷会社 */ ON M2.SIKIBETSU_CD = 'KASY' AND M2.MEISYO_CD = M1.JYURYOKAISYA_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN MDMT0100 M3 /* [名称MST] 出荷会社 */ ON M3.SIKIBETSU_CD = 'KASY' AND M3.MEISYO_CD = M1.SYUKKAKAISYA_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN BOMT0010_ALL M4 /* [店舗MST(全社)] */ ON M1.JYURYOKAISYA_CD = M4.KAISYA_CD AND M1.JYURYOTEN_CD = M4.TENPO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN BOMT0010_ALL M5 /* [店舗MST(全社)] */ ON M1.SYUKKAKAISYA_CD = M5.KAISYA_CD AND M1.SYUKKATEN_CD = M5.TENPO_CD WHERE M1.SAKUJYO_FLG = 0 AND M1.SIJI_BANGO =
